alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Towner, Cavalier, northern Ramsey and northwestern Walsh Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wales to 6 miles southwest of Edmore. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Langdon, Munich, Edmore, Osnabrock, Starkweather, Nekoma and Hampden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northeastern North Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
